item.description:
FRIDAY Nite Dance Party at the beautiful Tastebuds Banquet Facility FRIDAY August 14 from 8 pm to 1 am*

Age Group - 30’s *40’s * 50’s

Dress To Impress!

Join Central CT Singles And Hundreds Of Local Singles and Dance The Night Away –Meet Someone Special -Make New Friends,- And Party With Central CT Singles

“Singles Dances provide the opportunity to meet many local singles all in one place!
So if you dance, don't dance, or just want to party with other local singles and meet someone special,
check out the next Central CT Singles Dance Party”

Your Ticket Includes:
* Buffet
* DJ Dance Music and Requests *
* Plenty of FREE Safe Parking *

TASTEBUDS Banquet Facility
1450 Main Street
East Hartford, CT 06108
(860) 236-3343

On the corner of Main Street and Linden Street
For Directions, visit http://maps.google.co...

Directions from Manchester/Burnside Ave:
1) Follow Burnside Ave to Main Street
2) Turn Right on Main Street, Tastebuds is .3 miles on your Right

Directions from Hartford:
1) Take the CONN BLVD/US-44 E exit, EXIT 53 and follow to Main Street
2) Turn LEFT onto MAIN ST/US-44/US-5, Tastebuds is .7 miles on your Right

SUMMER SPECIAL - Tickets are only $10 at the Dance Party
ONLINE SPECIAL - 2 Tickets for $15 only at http://www.CentralCTS...

Check Out Our Ads In The Hartford Courant And The Hartford Advocate

Show any stamp or ticket from any other dance event, and get in for HALF PRICE!

Group Special - Half Price Tickets For Groups Of 10 or More
(only $5 per ticket) and Reserved Table(s) for your Group - Call (860) 236-3343 For Reservation

CELEBRATE YOUR BIRTHDAY WITH CENTRAL CT SINGLES -AND GET FREE ADMISSION FOR THE BIRTHDAY GUY or GAL AND FREE CHAMPAGNE - Call (860 236-3343 For Reservation)

Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!

UPCOMING EVENTS:

Thursday August 13 – The Odd Couple at the Ivoryton Playhouse with the CT Theatre Group
Enjoy the CT Theatre Group Discount Rate!
Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... for more info or call (860) 987-7888

Friday August 14 -Friday Nite Dance Party at TASTEBUDS Banquet Facility in East Hartford
SUMMER SPECIAL $10 includes DJ and Buffet
Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343

Sunday August 16 -Sunday Nite Dance Party at the Free Spirit Café in Vernon
SUMMER SPECIAL $10 includes DJ and Buffet
Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Friday Nite Dance Party at TASTEBUDS East Hartford Age Group 30's * 40's * 50's
